get.summary: Get historic stock data for a specific date in the past. Format endDateTime variable according to 'm/d/YYYY hh:mm aaa', example '4/4/2023 10:00 am'. If time is not specified, default it to 4:00 pm.

parameters.name: symbol
parameters.description: The ticker of a stock, ex TSLA for Tesla

get.summary: Get realtime detailed asset info like: fundamentals, earnings reports, calls and outlooks, analyst ratings and commentary, financials, revenue, margin, sales, etc
Market cap, pe ratio, ebitda, dividend yield, and other key asset fundamentals
Earnings transcripts for all stocks for the last 3 years, including all speakers. Returns excerpts from earnings calls. Ask a query in natural language including the symbol and quarter.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: A question in naural language. Include the sybmol and quarter you are referencing in the natural language query.

get.summary: Numeric info on last 4 quarters of earnings estimates and actuals, inclduing the current quarter estimate
Company information including name, location, executives, comapny logo etc.
Fundamental info for ETFs - type, trailing returns, expense ratio, prospectus link for more info
Latest quarterly finanicals: Income statement, Balance sheet, and Cash flows (ex revenue, profit, margins, etc.)
Historical quarterly financials for the company - Income statement, balance sheet, cash flows as well as other company-specific metrics.

get.description: Helpful for questions like 'Should I buy...' 'Should I invest in...' 'What are the opinions on...'
get.summary: Arguments for and against investing in the asset: Analyst ratings, recommendations, commentary and reports. (eg should I buy ...)
Crypto fundamentals - volume, transactions, active addresses etc.
Realtime stock, etf, crypto price quotes, including bid, ask, close, open, price changes. For crypto, format symbols with -CRYPTO suffix in lieu of -USD. For example, bitcoin is BTC-CRYPTO

parameters.name: symbols
parameters.description: ticker or symbol for each asset/instrument. for stocks keep symbol as is; for crypto, format symbols with -CRYPTO suffix in lieu of USD. For example, bitcoin is BTC-CRYPTO

get.summary: Quick summary on why the asset is moving today (eg Why is TSLA moving)
get.description: Why is it moving stock post for a given symbol

get.summary: Current news articles about the asset
get.description: The symbol path variable can be either a stock or crypto symbol (e.g. AAPL or BTC-CRYPTO).

get.summary: List of assets with highest gain/loss (movement) in the market today
Top gainers by percent change in the market today
Top losers by percent change in the market today
Assets with the highest trading volume today
Assets with the most unusual trading volume today (ie highest deviation from average volume)
Assets at their 52-week high
Assets at their 52-week low

QuoteDto.description: Realtime stock quotes and market data from Xignite

valueMultiplier.description: Used for multiplying of value on Y-axis when valueType is NUMBER, default value 1

valueFormat.description: Used for formatting of value on Y-axis

isoCurrency.description: ISO Currency, present when valueType is MONEY

currencySymbol.description: Currency symbol ($, â‚¬, CAD, etc), present when valueType is MONEY

location.description: The address where a company resides

companyName.description: The name of a company displayed on a stock page

companyDescription.description: The long company description of a company displayed on a stock page

CompanyProfileDetail.description: The company profile details containing info such as twitter, location and external link.

title.description: Represent the period for which the payout will be carried out for

actual.description: Represents the actual earnings for a quarter. Could be null if the earnings report of te instrument is not published

estimate.description: Consensus-rating of estimate earnings. Could be null due to missing estimates.

period.description: Period represented as year and quarter

eventDate.description: Date of the earnings calls event

EarningEstimatesDto.description: Consensus-level earnings estimate and actual earnings for the last 4 quarters inclusive the current one

esgRiskScore.description: ESG risk score, max value: 100 (sum of environment, social and governance risk score)

esgRiskCategory.description: ESG risk category, values: 0-10 is Negligible, 10-20 is Low, 20-30 is Medium, 30-40 is High and 40-100 is Severe

EsgRisk.description: Contains ESG risk scores (ESG risk score, ESG risk category and environment, governance, social risk score)

executives.description: A person or group having administrative or managerial authority in an organization, real users or manually created

ExecutivesDto.description: A person or group having administrative or managerial authority in an organization, real users or artificially created

FinancialMapping.description: Mapping of financials and financial labels

periodKey.description: Period, that the financials values belong to. For annual financials it is a year (e.g. 2022), for quarterly financials it is a quarter with a year (e.g. Q3 2022)

financialMapping.description: Mapping of financials and financial labels

financialKey.description: Financial identifier, used in chart mapping

earningEstimates.description: Consensus-level earnings estimate and actual earnings for the last 4 quarters inclusive the current one

chartsLastUpdated.description: Last updated date for charts from Hypercharts

bearsSay.description: List of opinions, what bears say about this stock

items.description: List of opinions, what bears say about this stock

bullsSay.description: List of opinions, what bulls say about this stock

items.description: List of opinions, what bulls say about this stock

reportLastUpdated.description: Last updated date for reports inside research, bullsSay, bearsSay

etfHoldingsLastUpdated.description: Last updated date for ETF holdings

buySellRatio.description: The number of sold and bought shares for last 7 days by public members

currentConsensusRating.description: Rating is calculated based on a 5 start rating average from number of sell, buy, hold, underweight and overweight recommendations

recommendation.description: Recommendations over the past 100 days calculated to consensus rating as average for a 5 start rating and a target price

InstrumentFundamentalDto.description: Fundamental data for a instrument mapped from Xignite

dailyActiveAddressesLastUpdated.description: Last updated date for daily addresses chart

transactionsLastUpdated.description: Last updated date for number of transactions chart

volumeLastUpdated.description: Last updated date for transactions volume chart

addressesOfHoldingsLastUpdated.description: Last updated date for addresses by holdings chart

IntoTheBlockGraphDto.description: Graphs for into the block crypto data

Price.description: Contains fair value of the stock

linkToTwitter.description: The link to the Twitter feed of the company

linkToPortal.description: The link to the company portal (external link)

linkToCompanyLogo.description: The link to the company logo image

PublicLinks.description: Set of company links to access the companyâ€™s page

Report.description: List of analyst reports, e.g. business strategy & outlook, economic moat

reports.description: List of analyst reports, e.g. business strategy & outlook, economic moat

Research.description: Contains list of reports and url to actual report pdf

multiple.description: Revenue multiple calculated: (marketCap + debt - cash) / revenue

latestQuarter.description: Latest quarter: Q1, Q2, Q3 or Q4, for which latestQuarterRevenue holds

Revenue.description: Contains revenue data (revenue multiple, growth, latest year revenue, latest quarter revenue).

userName.description: If stakeholder is a real user, userName is present if exists

verified.description: Indicator if the user is verified, added by Backend

publicId.description: If stakeholder is a real user, publicId is present

role.description: The Role of a user in the presented company.

uniqueId.description: UniqueId of a stakeholder used in the IR portal, nullable field.

Stakeholder.description: A person or group having administrative or managerial authority in an organization, real users or manually created

carouselId.description: For any carousel, this ID can be used to look it up directly.

bookmarkCategory.description: Optional bookmark category of a post, if null post was not bookmarked by a user

postSource.description: Which calculation method this post comes from

algorithmId.description: The algorithm that was used to find this specific post (used for logging which posts the user find interesting)

reactingFollowedUser.description: The publicId for a single user that reacted to this post (if we were able to look this up)

numberOfReactingFollowedUsers.description: The number of users, followed by this user, who reacted to this post (if we were able to look this up)

commentingFollowedUser.description: The publicId for a single user that commented on this post (if we were able to look this up)

numberOfCommentingFollowedUsers.description: The number of users, followed by this user, who commented on this post (if we were able to look this up)

viewCount.description: The number of times this post was served into feeds

blockedByPosterFlag.description: Flag to identify if the poster blocked a moderator

MovingStockPostDto.description: PostDto indicating if shares of a stock are moving higher or lower today

PostSeoDto.description: Available when a post has post SEO metadata

caption.description: This can be an empty list

highlightedComments.description: This can be an empty list

SocialInteractions.description: available when the user can react and comment on the post

ReactionsDto.description: Reactions to be added on the post. Either reactions or comment must be provided.

type.description: The content type for this chunk

ContentChunkDto.description: Storage for a single chunk of content

VideoContentChunkPayload.description: Content Chunk payload for streaming video.

CommentDto.description: This can be an empty list

carouselId.description: For any carousel, this ID can be used to look it up directly.

bookmarkCategory.description: Optional bookmark category of a post, if null post was not bookmarked by a user

postSource.description: Which calculation method this post comes from

algorithmId.description: The algorithm that was used to find this specific post (used for logging which posts the user find interesting)

reactingFollowedUser.description: The publicId for a single user that reacted to this post (if we were able to look this up)

numberOfReactingFollowedUsers.description: The number of users, followed by this user, who reacted to this post (if we were able to look this up)

commentingFollowedUser.description: The publicId for a single user that commented on this post (if we were able to look this up)

numberOfCommentingFollowedUsers.description: The number of users, followed by this user, who commented on this post (if we were able to look this up)

viewCount.description: The number of times this post was served into feeds

promotionFlags.description: Promotion flags that have been activated for this post

blockedByPosterFlag.description: Flag to identify if the poster blocked a moderator

feedPostCreated.description: Specifies whether the news post is persisted in the system or not. If false, the post needs to be created before reacting or commenting on it.

signature.description: A signature for the NewsPayload to be validated if the news post is to be saved later on.

flag.description: The type of flag on the DTO

from.description: The point in time when this is activated (which was instantly, is it wasn't specified)

until.description: The point in time when this expires (or 2070, if it wasn't specified)

PromotionFlagDto.description: A promotion that is currently active for a specific post

movers.description: TopMovers subset of top gainers and top losers sorted decs. by absolute value of percentChangeFromPreviousClose
